articles.description: While appearing on Late Night With Seth Meyers , the Big Mouth star made the happy announcement while talking about what she's been up to while holed up at home.
articles.content:
Jenny Slate has been baking more than bread during the coronavirus pandemic.
The actress revealed the happy news on Thursday that she's pregnant with her first child with fiancé Ben Shattuck, who sh… [+2165 chars]

articles.title: Harvey Weinstein will remain in New York State prison after extradition to California is postponed - Daily Mail
articles.description: Convicted former movie producer Harvey Weinstein, 68, appeared via Zoom for a court hearing while imprisoned at Wende Correctional Facility east of Buffalo, New York, on Friday.
